meanings.definition: Most attractive or impressive in a masculine way
meanings.sent1: He is the studliest guy in our class.
meanings.sent2: The actor was voted the studliest man in Hollywood.
meanings.sent3: The studliest cowboy in the Wild West rode into town on a pink pony.
meanings.sent4: His confidence made him the studliest player on the team.
meanings.sent5: The studliest superhero saved the day with his charm and strength.

meanings.definition: The highest level of attractiveness or desirability among males
meanings.sent1: She couldn't resist his charm and fell for the studliest in the room.
meanings.sent2: The magazine cover featured the studliest of all male models.
meanings.sent3: At the dog show, the poodle was crowned the studliest of them all.
meanings.sent4: In the world of fashion, he was known as the studliest among male designers.
meanings.sent5: The studliest in the pack led the group with his charisma and style.
